id: scenario-autonomous-entity-franchise-operator-scenarios-individual-operator achieves debt freedom through fair acquisition
did: did:web:elohim.host:content:autonomous-entity:franchise-operator:scenarios:individual-operator achieves debt freedom through fair acquisition
title: Operator achieves debt freedom through fair acquisition
description: Operator achieves debt freedom through fair acquisition
content:
Scenario: Operator achieves debt freedom through fair acquisition
    Given James owes $600K in franchise loans after $1M initial investment
    And corporate extracts 40% of revenue before he sees any profit
    When EAE offers $750K acquisition for three franchise locations
    Then James pays off $600K debt completely
    And receives $150K return on $400K family investment over five years
    And debt burden that dominated his life for years is lifted
    And financial freedom comes without worker exploitation or community betrayal
    And workplace_elohim ensures acquisition pricing is fair to all parties
